description: This file defines the Home component for the front-end React application, serving as the public landing page with calls-to-action such as 'Get Started' and 'Explore'. It imports common UI components, logging, API client, and feature flag services, and handles user interactions with corresponding logging and feature flag checks.

methods.name: Home()
methods.description: React functional component that renders the home page with buttons for 'Get Started' and 'Explore' and handles their click events.

methods.name: onGetStarted
methods.description: Async function invoked when 'Get Started' button is clicked; makes a test API call and logs the action.

methods.name: onExplore
methods.description: Function invoked when 'Explore' button is clicked; checks if 'exploreV2' feature flag is enabled and logs the result.
